text: Pâté is a mixture of ground or pureed meat and fat. "Pâté" means "paste" in French. Pâté can be in the form of a meatloaf or a spread that can be put onto bread with a knife. Pâté is very popular in French cooking. == Types == Foie gras is a famous type of Pâté made from the livers of ducks or geese. title: Pâté
